URGENT - WINTER WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE SPOKANE WA
514 AM PST FRI DEC 5 2014

WAZ034-035-051415-
/O.CAN.KOTX.ZR.Y.0004.000000T0000Z-141205T1500Z/
MOSES LAKE AREA-UPPER COLUMBIA BASIN-
514 AM PST FRI DEC 5 2014

...FREEZING RAIN ADVISORY IS CANCELLED...

TEMPERATURES HAVE WARMED TO FREEZING OR SLIGHTLY WARMER ACROSS
MUCH OF THE AREA AND SHOULD REMAIN THAT WAY THROUGH THE DAY.
ANOTHER ROUND OF LIGHT PRECIPITATION IS STILL EXPECTED TO ARRIVE LATER
THIS MORNING...BUT BASED ON TEMPERATURES MOST WILL FALL AS RAIN. A
FEW POCKETS OF FREEZING RAIN ARE STILL POSSIBLE.

/O.EXT.KOTX.ZR.Y.0004.000000T0000Z-141205T2100Z/
WENATCHEE AREA-EAST SLOPES NORTHERN CASCADES-WATERVILLE PLATEAU-
INCLUDING THE FOLLOWING LOCATIONS...WENATCHEE...CHELAN...ENTIAT...
CASHMERE...LEAVENWORTH...STEHEKIN...BLEWETT PASS...WATERVILLE...
MANSFIELD...BADGER MOUNTAIN ROAD
514 AM PST FRI DEC 5 2014

...FREEZING RAIN ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS
AFTERNOON...

* LOCATIONS...WENATCHEE...CHELAN...ENTIAT...CASHMERE... 
  LEAVENWORTH...STEHEKIN...BLEWETT PASS...WATERVILLE...
  MANSFIELD... BADGER MOUNTAIN ROAD.

* ICE ACCUMULATIONS...A TENTH OF AN INCH OR LESS.

* TIMING...LIGHT FREEZING RAIN IS EXPECTED TO REDEVELOP AFTER 8 
  AM AND CONTINUE THROUGH MID-MORNING OR POSSIBLY LONGER.

* IMPACTS...TRAVEL CONDITIONS COULD BECOME HAZARDOUS LATER THIS
  MORNING. THE WORST CONDITIONS ARE EXPECTED ON SECONDARY AND
  LESSER TRAVELED ROADS. WITH TEMPERATURES EXPECTED TO CLIMB
  TOWARD FREEZING OR SLIGHTLY ABOVE LATER TODAY THE THREAT OF
  FREEZING RAIN WILL EASE. THE EXCEPTION WILL BE NEAR THE CASCADE
  CREST SOUTH OF LAKE CHELAN WHERE COOLER POCKETS COULD RESULT IN
  SOME FREEZING RAIN PERSISTING INTO THE EARLY AFTERNOON.

* TEMPERATURES...IN THE UPPER 20S TO LOWER 30S.

* WEB PAGE: FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WRH.NOAA.GOV/WRH/WHV/?WFO=OTX.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A FREEZING RAIN ADVISORY MEANS THAT PERIODS OF FREEZING RAIN OR
FREEZING DRIZZLE WILL CAUSE TRAVEL DIFFICULTIES. BE PREPARED FOR
SLIPPERY ROADS. SLOW DOWN AND USE CAUTION WHILE DRIVING.
